description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Modal' that renders a modal dialog using portal patterns with accessibility features. It accepts props to control visibility, title, content, and actions. The component manages event listeners for closing the modal on pressing Escape.

methods.name: Modal({ open, onClose, title, children, actions })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a modal dialog with accessibility support, controlled via props.

ctags.name: Modal
ctags.pattern: /^export function Modal({ open, onClose, title, children, actions }) {$/
